mainText:
I am a huge supporter of Apple, I have been all my life as I am 22.  
Steve Jobs was such a visionary that he was able to usher in a whole  
new era of technology and to that, it really means a lot for the  
world. He has touched every single one of us in some way shape or  
form. Even though I never got to meet him, I knew a lot about him and  
considered him my idol, my superman of technology if you will. To the  
entire Jobs family and friends, my deepest condolences for your loss.  
To Apple you lost a father, but you will pull through. Rest in Peace  
Steve Jobs.
author: Andrew
